content:
What's the right way to specify the date query string when implementing the $everything operation for the Patient resource? At the (end of the) resource ID, or after the operation name? Are the following two examples correct?

Get me everything about all patients' care from October 1 through October 7, 2018:
GET baseurl/Patient/?start=20181001&end=20181007/$everything

Get me everything about patient 123's care from October 1 through October 7, 2018:
GET baseurl/Patient/123?start=20181001&end=20181007/$everything
